text: Na lau Mwenyezi Mungu Awaharakishia watu kuyakubali maombi yao ya kujitakia mabaya kama Anavyowaharakishia katika kuwakubalia maombi yao ya kujitakia mazuri wangaliangamia. Hivyo basi tunawaacha, wale ambao hawaogopi mateso yetu wala hawaamini kidhati kufufuliwa na kuhuishwa, ndani ya uasi wao na ujeuri wao hali ya kuwa wanashangaa na kuduwaa
